summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2837 for the improvement of Admiral Way, from West Spokane Street to Sixty-third Avenue Southwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 34174, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
